actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow any individual employed on a part-time basis to deduct under section 214 expenses for household and dependent care services necessary for gainful employment.

summary.text: Allows a tax deduction under the Internal Revenue Code for the household and dependent care expenses necessary for gainful employment where such employment is part-time, but not less than twenty hours a week. Reduces by one-half the maximum monthly dollar limitations on such deduction where the taxpayer qualifies for such deduction on the basis of part-time gainful employment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow any individual employed on a part-time basis to deduct under section 214 expenses for household and dependent care services necessary for gainful employment.
